page.title: 13FOOD IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content: {FISH WE EAT FISH FINGERS, WHICH ARE BITS OF FISH MADE INTO AN OBLONG SHAPE COVERED WITH BREADCRUMBS. WE EAT FISH CAKES. THEY ARE FISH MIXED WITH POTATOES AND THEN FRIED. OTHER FISH WE EAT IS USUALLY BOUGHT FROZEN AND KEPT IN OUR FREEZERS UNTIL WE ARE READY TO EAT IT. {FOOD I ATE ON 6TH JULY 1985 FOR MY BREAKFAST I HAD WEETABIX WITH BUTTER ON IT AND MILK TO DRINK. FOR LUNCH I HAD A CRACKER,BUTTER AND CHEESE AND MILK. FOR DINNER I HAD STEAK,POTATOES,RAW CARROTS AND GRAVY. AT TEA TIME I HAD A SALAD SANDWICH AND COFFEE TO DRINK. I HAD A MILK SHAKE FOR MY SUPPER.
